nodes.documentation:
@notice Authorize a third party `_operator` to manage (send) `msg.sender`'s tokens.
 @param _operator The operator that wants to be Authorized
nodes.name: authorizeOperator

nodes.documentation:
@notice Revoke a third party `_operator`'s rights to manage (send) `msg.sender`'s tokens.
 @param _operator The operator that wants to be Revoked
nodes.name: revokeOperator

nodes.documentation:
@notice Authorize a third party `_operator` to manage (send) `msg.sender`'s tokens with issued signature.
 @param _operator The operator that wants to be Authorized
nodes.name: authorizeOperatorWithSignature

nodes.documentation:
@notice Revoke a third party `_operator`'s rights to manage (send) `msg.sender`'s tokens with issued signature.
 @param _operator The operator that wants to be Revoked
nodes.name: revokeOperatorWithSignature

operatorSend
mint
burn

@dev Function to stop minting new tokens.
@return True if the operation was successful.
